reviewText: Slipshod plot. Laughable acting. WHO CARES?! Big Pam delivers the goods!! (A few times)Most notable of which takes place in a back alley. You wanna see Big Pam get her big breasts sucked on, her big butt-cheeks sucked on, and then get raped from behind by a big, burly stranger and lovin every minute of it? This is the flick for you! See it now!!!

This is one of the worst films ever made.  The acting is horrible, the conspiracy plot is ludicrous, but what is worse is that it's so bad we don't care.  All we do is wait for Pam to take her clothes off again.  On the bright side, it arguaby contains one of the best sex scenes ever made (that is if you like getting that sort of thing from a B film instead of good old fashioned porn).  The smart move would be find the 2 minute scene in the alley on your DVD and don't bother with the rest.

I got this dvd a while ago and.....all I have to say is super boring (very thin story) and super bad acting....with Pamela being the worst in it, she really needs to go to acting school......this film is such a waist that I in fact I did not even bother selling this dvd...I just throw it away...

That's it,next time I'm renting her Playboy video. Though superior to the mind blowingly awful Naked Souls,Good Cop,Bad Cop still doesn't feature enough sexually gagging-for-it Pamela to satisfy the red blooded male. There is quite a titillating romping session in an alleyway and seeing Pam in night-atire is never unappealling,but this is all I want,not a boring conspiracy story to go with it. The soundtrack to this film is a really irritating and repetitive sample of Bad to the Bone,David Keith is a poor man's Michael Madsen and Robert Hays is a poor man's James Woods. And one of the bad guys seems to think he's Robert DeNiro. Their lame acting would be perfect if this was the most sexually explicit piece of trash around. Sadly,it's anything but. Still,stay on the screen Pamela baby. And I'm sure you had no intention of playing the good cop.

Well, well... This is an action/thriller staring the ultimate buxom babe, Pamela Anderson. Who cares about the plot!  Well, Pamela encounters some mean 'ol nasty criminals, and she has no choice but to team up with her  trusty side-kick, David Keith. Did I mention Pamela takes a throbbing love  muscle up her pretty littlebuns!  Well, she does, and she takes it pretty  well. You can actually hear her sweet moans of pure pleasure! Pamela with  out a doubt, has some delicious buns! Botom like... Pamela delivers the  goodies. Check this movie out!

Raw Justice is a low budget 1994 erotic action/thriller starring Pamela Anderson, Robert Hays, David Keith, Stacy Keach, Ted Prior, Leo Rossi, and Charles Napier

The shy and insecure Mitch McCullum has just dropped off his cutie of a date, Donna Stiles, following a failed date of mini-golf. Following a shower, an unknown, mysterious man breaks into Donna's home and chokes her to death. Not too long after, Mitch is believed to be the main suspect behind Donna's murder and the police are busting down Mitch's door and arresting him for it.

The next morning, Mitch is released from prison on bail. Turns out Donna was the daughter of the town's mayor, David Stiles. David refuses an autopsy on his daughter and instead turns to mutual friend Mace; an ex-cop/turned bounty hunter to find clues and get the truth on what really happened. Stiles believes that getting the cops involved in the investigation would be too risky and that Mace is the perfect man for the job as someone who's a "loose cannon" and works outside the law.

Mace reluctantly agrees and tracks down Mitch. Mace comes to the conclusion that someone is after Mitch and tried to frame him for Donna's murder...or at least so it seems at the moment. Due to his association with Mitch, Mace's life is at stake as well. While talking to Sarah, a feisty prostitute, whom he got into an altercation with the previous night, she's quickly unintentionally dragged into the chaos after a few hired mercenaries catch Mace talking to her, assuming she's working with him. Unfortunately the police is more corrupt in town than suspected as it turns out someone in the office is behind this chaos with a bigger picture in store and has murderous, corrupt motives with a bigger picture at hand

Overall: Surprisingly enough, Raw Justice is a rare OOP film and hard to find at a cheap price. It's shocking considering how bad this movie is. But the thing is, it's so bad, it's good. I can honestly say that the only reason the sexy Pamela Anderson was cast in this film was to serve as a sex appeal accessory. Had she not been in this movie, I can give you all of my assurance that it would be completely forgettable (more than it already is) and it'd be all negative reviews. Raw Justice is extremely cheesy and uses pretty much every movie cliche in the book. Bar fights? Check! Anti-hero tough guy trying to be tough by wearing all black and shades that only come off when he takes them off and stays on his face during fights? Check! Building explosion with the classic slow motion run? Check! Erotic sex scenes with mellow saxophone music dubbed in the background? Check! Gun fights? Check! Random chases? Check! It's impossible to take this movie seriously at any point in time but I'm not sure they were aiming for any of this to be serious. In almost every scene of the movie there's this campy low budget stock music that plays making it impossible for any scene to be serious. The dialogue isn't spectacular neither are the performances. Pamela Anderson's performance was probably the worst but it doesn't really matter because as I said she was in this as part of a sex appeal accessory and she delivered in that role as there are about 2 sex scenes. Really this movie was so cheesy and mildly bad it turned out to be really enjoyable. So if you can find it at a low price, I suppose it wouldn't hurt to kill an hour or so watching this cheesy B film
pam anderson scorches the screen !!!! just oozes sex appeal in this campy cheesy action flick , a must watch 4 her alone
it was good anything with Pamela Anderson will be good. Classic b movie action sex comedy they have it in this movie.

This movie is filled with action and more action. David Prior once again proves he knows how to do action flicks. Robert Hays and Pamela Anderson along with David Keith will keep you interested to the very end. From car jumps to airboat crashes, Hang On, Very entertaining for some weekend enjoyment
I paid way too much for this . maybe $20.00 . other than it was alright i guess

Not a great movie so i'm glad it was only on VHS
